charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Unleashes a torrent that can cleanse the world.
description.3: Sends a Torrent Surge forward that will deal <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro> to opponents it comes into contact with.
description.6: Enter Aiming Mode and constantly fire off Dewdrops in the direction in which you are aiming, dealing <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro> to opponents they hit.
description.7: When the skill ends, it will send a Torrent Surge forward that will deal <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro> to opponents it comes into contact with.
description.8: Suffusion: When using the Hold configuration of this skill, if the Traveler's HP is higher than 50%, the DMG dealt by Dewdrops will increase based on the Traveler's Max HP, and the Traveler will lose a fixed amount of HP every second.
description.11: At certain intervals, after using Torrent Surge, this skill will unleash a Spiritbreath Thorn that pierces opponents, dealing Pneuma-aligned <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro>.
description.13: You studied the ripples in the water with Paimon.

description.0: Unleashes a slow-moving floating bubble that deals continuous <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro> to nearby opponents.
description.2: You studied the ebb and flow of the tides with Paimon.

description.0: After the Dewdrop fired by the Hold Mode of the Aquacrest Saber hits an opponent, a Sourcewater Droplet will be generated near to the Traveler. If the Traveler picks it up, they will restore 7% HP.
description.1: 1 Droplet can be created this way every second, and each use of Aquacrest Saber can create 4 Droplets at most.

description.0: If HP has been consumed via Suffusion while using the Hold Mode Aquacrest Saber, the Torrent Surge at the skill's end will deal Bonus DMG equal to 45% of the total HP the Traveler has consumed in this skill use via Suffusion.
description.1: The maximum DMG Bonus that can be gained this way is 5,000.

description.0: Picking up a Sourcewater Droplet will restore 2 Energy to the Traveler.
The Movement SPD of Rising Waters' bubble will be decreased by 30%, and its duration increased by 3s.
Increases the Level of Aquacrest Saber by 3.

When using Aquacrest Saber, an Aquacrest Aegis that can absorb 10% of the Traveler's Max HP in DMG will be created and will absorb Hydro DMG with 250% effectiveness. It will persist until the Traveler finishes using the skill.
description.1: Once every 2s, after a Dewdrop hits an opponent, if the Traveler is being protected by Aquacrest Aegis, the DMG Absorption of the Aegis will be restored to 10% of the Traveler's Max HP. If the Traveler is not presently being protected by an Aegis, one will be redeployed.

description.0: Increases the Level of Rising Waters by 3.
When the Traveler picks up a Sourcewater Droplet, they will restore HP to a nearby party member with the lowest remaining HP percentage based on 6% of said member's Max HP.
